item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 6, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Did Sandia use a thermonuclear secondary in a product logo? (63 points | 1 comment)

25. Why Don't Tech Companies Pay Their Engineers to Stay? (133 points | 173 comments)
